channel.title: INAR models on Lucio Palazzo
channel.description: Recent content in INAR models on Lucio Palazzo

item.title: Bootstrap test in Poisson-INAR models
item.description: In this paper we exploit bootstrap–based specification test on the autoregressive coefficient in INteger–AutoRegressive models (INAR) considering the case of homoskedastic Poisson innovations. Performance of four unrestricted bootstrap methods are analyzed through a small–scale Monte carlo exesercise.

item.title: Bootstrap-based score test for INAR effect
item.description: This work exploits the potential of bootstrap methods in testing for serial dependence in the class of observed driven Integer-AutoRegressive (INAR) models with Poisson innovations. The main contribution is to develop a novel restricted bootstrap algorithm to improve the performance of score-based test statistic, especially in case of moderately small series.

item.title: Integer Autoregressive modeling: a new gretl routine
item.description: This paper focuses on a family of observation-driven models for autoregressive discrete-valued data, called INAR models. The main purpose of the project is to write and document a set of Gretl Econometric Software functions that perform time series estimation of one-lagged univariate INAR models with Poisson and Negative Binomial marginals.
